definition[0]: relating to a situation in which whatever you choose to do it will have a bad result
example[0]: If my child is sick and I leave work, I’m a bad employee. If I don’t, I’m a bad mother. It’s a no-win situation.
definition[1]: a situation etc which will end badly whatever people decide to do
example[1]: The decision could put companies in a no-win situation.
example[2]: He undertook what many regarded as a no-win task: streamlining the company’s data processing.
